t: Love Grown – Hive Brands
s: Love Grown was founded in 2008 by two University of Denver students who believed cereal deserved better—made with simple ingredients, more protein and fiber, and less sugar. Their mission won over cereal-loving families nationwide. But in 2023, rising costs nearly shut Love Grown down.

t: Love Grown Foods | Hughes BrandMix
